## DAGs and Causal Inference

```{r}
#| echo: TRUE
#| message: FALSE
#| warning: FALSE
#| error: FALSE
library(dagitty)
dag <- dagitty('dag {
  Education -> "Math Abillty"
  Time -> Maturation
  Maturation -> Education
  Maturation -> "Shoe Size"
  Time -> Education
}')
plot(dag)
```
